ai-ya6.3:1.1_0: One who understands the physical process, the verbal processes subsistantively, and the mental processes broke up.
ai-ya6.3:2.1_0: One who understands the physical process, the verbal processes subtlety of the body,
ai-ya6.3:3.1_0: Just as analyzed into the mass of suffering, so should he be completely understood.
ai-ya6.3:5.1_0: The Book of the Choices is finished.
